transcript:
Customer: Are wo bulao aap dobara na aap na pad gaya tha phone.
Executive: Are sir actually wo number me mujhe incoming band aa raha tha. Isiliye maine aapko. Nahi nahi dobara nahi dobara milao aap.
Customer: Accha theek hai. Incoming to band ho meri baat ho rahi.
Executive: Nahi mujhe aisa bataya theek hai mai kar rahi hu sir sorry. Ek bar karo mai kar rahi hu fir dekh lijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer asks why the executive called again after a previous call.



Resolution:

- Executive states that the incoming calls were blocked on their number and apologizes, asking the customer to try again.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Customer is asked to try calling again.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral to apologetic.



@@@Key Topics:

call issue, incoming calls
